SQL.LOAD: select invoice_recon_wrk_id, claimload_file_processed_id, record_type, reject_code, reject_reason, loaded, company_code, company_id, invoice_number, invoice_date, invoice_id, repair_date, attributes, claim_number, claim_id, authorization_number, authorization_id, line_item_number, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, service_center_id, service_center_code, service_class_id, service_type_id, amount, due_date, entire_record, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, service_level, service_level_id from elp_invoice_recon_wrk where invoice_recon_wrk_id = hextoraw(:invoice_recon_wrk_id)
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT rw.INVOICE_RECON_WRK_ID, rw.CLAIMLOAD_FILE_PROCESSED_ID, rw.RECORD_TYPE, rw.REJECT_CODE, rw.REJECT_REASON, rw.LOADED, rw.COMPANY_CODE, rw.COMPANY_ID, rw.INVOICE_NUMBER, rw.INVOICE_DATE, rw.INVOICE_ID, rw.REPAIR_DATE, rw.ATTRIBUTES, rw.CLAIM_NUMBER, rw.CLAIM_ID, rw.AUTHORIZATION_NUMBER, rw.AUTHORIZATION_ID, rw.LINE_ITEM_NUMBER, rw.vendor_SKU, rw.vendor_SKU_DESCRIPTION, rw.SERVICE_CENTER_ID, rw.SERVICE_CENTER_CODE, rw.SERVICE_CLASS_ID, rw.SERVICE_TYPE_ID, rw.AMOUNT, rw.DUE_DATE, rw.ENTIRE_RECORD, rw.CREATED_BY, rw.CREATED_DATE, rw.MODIFIED_BY, rw.MODIFIED_DATE, rw.SERVICE_LEVEL, rw.SERVICE_LEVEL_ID, mc.MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT, (SELECT TRANSLATION FROM ELP_LABEL innerL Inner join elp_dict_item_translation innert on innert.DICT_ITEM_ID = innerl.DICT_ITEM_ID and innert.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id WHERE innerL.ui_prog_code = l.ui_prog_code ) Translated_MSG FROM elp_invoice_recon_wrk rw left outer join (select MSG_CODE, LABEL_ID, MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT From elp_message_code inner join ELP_LIST_ITEM li ON msg_type = li.LIST_ITEM_ID AND li.code = 'VLREJECT' INNER JOIN ELP_LIST l ON l.LIST_ID = li.LIST_ID AND l.code = 'MSGTYPE') mc on mc.MSG_CODE = rw.reject_code left outer join elp_label l on l.label_id = mc.label_id WHERE rw.claimload_file_processed_id = hextoraw(:claimload_file_processed_id) and reject_reason IS NOT NULL
SQL.LOAD_BY_CLAIM_LOAD_FILE_PROCESSED_ID: SELECT rw.INVOICE_RECON_WRK_ID, rw.CLAIMLOAD_FILE_PROCESSED_ID, rw.RECORD_TYPE, rw.REJECT_CODE, rw.REJECT_REASON, rw.LOADED, rw.COMPANY_CODE, rw.COMPANY_ID, rw.INVOICE_NUMBER, rw.INVOICE_DATE, rw.INVOICE_ID, rw.REPAIR_DATE, rw.ATTRIBUTES, rw.CLAIM_NUMBER, rw.CLAIM_ID, rw.AUTHORIZATION_NUMBER, rw.AUTHORIZATION_ID, rw.LINE_ITEM_NUMBER, rw.vendor_SKU, rw.vendor_SKU_DESCRIPTION, rw.SERVICE_CENTER_ID, rw.SERVICE_CENTER_CODE, rw.SERVICE_CLASS_ID, rw.SERVICE_TYPE_ID, rw.AMOUNT, rw.DUE_DATE, rw.ENTIRE_RECORD, rw.CREATED_BY, rw.CREATED_DATE, rw.MODIFIED_BY, rw.MODIFIED_DATE, rw.SERVICE_LEVEL, rw.SERVICE_LEVEL_ID from elp_invoice_recon_wrk rw where rw.claimload_file_processed_id = hextoraw(:claimload_file_processed_id) order by rw.INVOICE_NUMBER, rw.AUTHORIZATION_ID
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_invoice_recon_wrk SET claimload_file_processed_id = :claimload_file_processed_id, record_type = :record_type, reject_code = :reject_code, reject_reason = :reject_reason, loaded = :loaded, company_code = :company_code, company_id = :company_id, invoice_number = :invoice_number, invoice_date = :invoice_date, invoice_id = :invoice_id, repair_date = :repair_date, attributes = :attributes, claim_number = :claim_number, claim_id = :claim_id, authorization_number = :authorization_number, authorization_id = :authorization_id, line_item_number = :line_item_number, vendor_sku = :vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description = :vendor_sku_description, service_center_id = :service_center_id, service_center_code = :service_center_code, service_class_id = :service_class_id, service_type_id = :service_type_id, amount = :amount, due_date = :due_date, entire_record = :entire_record, modified_by = :modified_by, service_level = :service_level, service_level_id = :service_level_id WHERE invoice_recon_wrk_id = :invoice_recon_wrk_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_invoice_recon_wrk ( claimload_file_processed_id, record_type, reject_code, reject_reason, loaded, company_code, company_id, invoice_number, invoice_date, invoice_id, repair_date, attributes, claim_number, claim_id, authorization_number, authorization_id, line_item_number, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, service_center_id, service_center_code, service_class_id, service_type_id, amount, due_date, entire_record, created_by, invoice_recon_wrk_id, service_level, service_level_id ) VALUES ( :claimload_file_processed_id, :record_type, :reject_code, :reject_reason, :loaded, :company_code, :company_id, :invoice_number, :invoice_date, :invoice_id, :repair_date, :attributes, :claim_number, :claim_id, :authorization_number, :authorization_id, :line_item_number, :vendor_sku, :vendor_sku_description, :service_center_id, :service_center_code, :service_class_id, :service_type_id, :amount, :due_date, :entire_record, :created_by, :invoice_recon_wrk_id, :service_level, :service_level_id )
